resources.string: A pre-task plan is one of the main components in safety management. A pre-task plan is aimed at preventing unsafe acts, potential injuries and other harmful activities before they are performed in a particular environment.

Does the following task include any High Risk Operations? 

 Hazardous Energy Source
 Work from Heights
 Hot Work
 Confined Space
 Hoisting and Rigging
 Activity in the Yard or near moving vehicles
 Non-standard task on an Active Robotics Floor
 Fire/Life-Safety System inspection, testing, or maintenance
 Construction, Installation or Demolition
 RME activity within VNA/Pallet Racking or in active PIT Lane
 Dock door or leveler
Yes, the Work Order is being completed by an Avetta Certified 3rd Party Supplier or under the emergency contractor/supplier onboarding procedure
Yes, I will tag a completed PtP Survey (Note: Use this option ONLY if you are performing a Work Order that requires a single LOTO which is already completed on a different Work Order)
No, and I will perform a Take-2 Assessment before beginning my work.
No, no work performed on this work order
Spinner used for displaying a list of Equipment
